11  package de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter;
12  
13  import org.apache.commons.lang3.JavaVersion;
14  import org.apache.commons.lang3.SystemUtils;
15  import org.openide.modules.ModuleInstall;
16  
17  public class Installer extends ModuleInstall {
18  	private static final long serialVersionUID = -4271835537575254490L;
19  
20  	@Override
21  	public void validate() throws IllegalStateException {
22  		super.validate();
23  
24  		if (!SystemUtils.isJavaVersionAtLeast(JavaVersion.JAVA_11)) {
25  			throw new IllegalStateException("This plugin only works with Java 11+, but NetBeans is running with Java " + SystemUtils.JAVA_VERSION);
26  		}
27  	}
28  }
